item.description:
For lack of a better idea, why don't we just meet at Edge of the Woods again? Grab food downstairs or bring your own, then meet upstairs.

Possible discussion topics for this month: 1) Your motivation(s) for being vegan. Health? Animal rights? The environment? A combination thereof? 2) How do you deal with the difficulties some vegans face, e.g. unsupportive family, cost, availability of vegan products? 3) Fun things we can do at future Meetups. Or come with a topic of your own!

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: January Meetup
